bio.firstParagraph: Hi! I'm Christian, and I'm a front-end developer with recently acquired education from Noroff. Based in Steinkjer, TrÃ¸ndelag, I've found my passion in creating digital experiences that combine creative design with seamless functionality.
bio.secondParagraph: As a developer, I'm driven by the desire to build websites that not only look great but also provide users with an intuitive and engaging experience. I believe good design is about balancing aesthetics and usability, where each line of code contributes to creating something meaningful. With a solid foundation in modern web development techniques and an eye for detail, I continuously work to develop myself and stay updated on new technologies.

holidaze.title: Holidaze
holidaze.description: Holidaze was my final exam project in front-end development at Noroff, known as Project Exam 2.
features: User Authentication: Registration and login for both customers and hosts
Search and Filter: User-friendly search and filtering of accommodations
Map Functionality: Dynamic location-based updates
Booking System: Creation and management of bookings
Admin Panel: Create, update, and delete venues
Responsive Design: Optimized for all screen sizes

crimsonCart.title: Crimson Cart (Ecom Store)
crimsonCart.description: Crimson Cart is an eCommerce platform developed as a school project to demonstrate skills in React. The task involved building a complete online store with functionality for product display, shopping cart, and orders, based on a given API. The site has a responsive design and provides a seamless shopping experience.
features: Dynamic product overview based on API data
Detail page for individual products with price, discounts, and ratings
Look-ahead search function that filters products based on name
Shopping cart with ability to add/remove products
Checkout page that clears cart after purchase
Contact form with validation for name, email, subject, and message
Responsive design for mobile, tablet, and desktop

gavelGlance.title: Gavel Glance (Auction Site)
gavelGlance.description: Gavel Glance is a modern and dynamic auction platform developed as part of Noroff's semester project 2. The site is designed to let users add auction items, bid on others' items, and manage their own auctions. The platform offers seamless navigation, responsive design, and functionality that creates an engaging user experience.
features: User authentication (registration, login, avatar updates)
Dynamic display and search of auction items
Ability to create and manage own auctions
Bidding functionality on others' auctions
Overview of user credit and bid history
Responsive design optimized for multiple devices

ironCrew.title: Iron Crew (Social Media Client)
ironCrew.description: Iron Crew is a social media client project developed as part of Noroff's JavaScript 2 exam. The site allows users to create accounts, post content, and interact with others through a responsive and user-friendly interface.
features: User registration with Noroff email
User login and authentication
Content display in a feed
Search and filtering functionality for posts
Create, edit, and delete posts
Responsive design for multiple devices

grooveGrid.title: Groove Grid
grooveGrid.description: Groove Grid is a drum blog developed as the first-year exam at Noroff. The site demonstrates the ability to build dynamic, responsive, and user-friendly websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and WordPress REST API.
features: Dynamic blog content with WordPress REST API
Latest posts section with carousel layout on Home page
Blog page showing first 10 posts with load more option
Specific blog post page with dynamic content and modal image view
Custom JavaScript validation for contact form
Responsive design for seamless experience across all devices

mainStreetRevival.title: Main Street Revival
mainStreetRevival.description: This is the official website for my band, Main Street Revival, developed with Next.js. The site includes a unique, from-scratch developed music player with an animated vinyl record that rotates when music is playing.
features: Custom music player with animated vinyl record
Detailed information about the band and upcoming concerts
Responsive design for optimal user experience across all devices
SEO optimization for better visibility online
Interactive elements that highlight the band's identity

gameHub.title: GameHub
gameHub.description: GameHub is a modern e-commerce platform built as part of a cross-course project. The platform is developed with JavaScript and integrates WordPress REST API to dynamically fetch products from WooCommerce.
features: Dynamic product content from WordPress REST API
Product detail pages with specific data
Responsive design for all devices
Categorization and display of products
Basic sorting and filtering functions

csm.title: Community Science Museum
csm.description: Community Science Museum is an interactive and informative website designed to engage primary school children (7-15 years) and families. The site is created to be inspiring, user-friendly, and inclusive.
features: Responsive design that works on all devices
WCAG-adapted for accessibility
Attractive and targeted design for children and families
Fast loading with optimized images
Structured and semantic HTML elements
